alert.note: Alert for Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 18 at 3:34AM PDT until May 19 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 AM PDT THURSDAY PASS... * WHAT...Snow expected at Washington Pass. Total snow accumulations between 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Western Okanogan County County..namely Washington Pass along Highway 20. * WHEN...From Noon today to 5 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Initially the snow might have a difficult time accumulating on roads, but could begin to accumulate this afternoon and overnight as heavy bands of snow move into the area. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
